languages.text: "Механические ковчеги — святыни Адептус Механикус. Каждый из таких кораблей — реликвия. Они необычайно древние и сотворены для поиска благословенных образцов Стандартных Шаблонных Конструкций. Легенды повествуют о целых мирах-кузнях, которые в прямом смысле были разобраны на запчасти для сотворения подобных кораблей".

"Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."
languages.original_text: "Механические ковчеги — святыни Адептус Механикус. Каждый из таких кораблей — реликвия. Они необычайно древние и сотворены для поиска благословенных образцов Стандартных Шаблонных Конструкций. Легенды повествуют о целых мирах-кузнях, которые в прямом смысле были разобраны на запчасти для сотворения подобных кораблей".

traits.locale_text: "Each Ark is a sacred object for Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire Forge Worlds that were literally disassembled into parts for the making of such vessels."

"Each Ark is a sacred object for Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire Forge Worlds that were literally disassembled into parts for the making of such vessels."

"Each Ark is a sanctuary for Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire Forge Worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

"Each Ark is a sanctuary for Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire Forge Worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

"Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

languages.text: “每艘方舟都是机械修会的避难所，每艘这样的飞船都是修会的圣物。这些飞船非常古老，它们的用途是寻找失落的神圣标准建造模板。根据传说记载，为了制造这样的舰船，数个铸造世界被直接拆成了零件。”
languages.original_text: "Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

traits.locale_text: “每艘方舟都是机械修会的避难所，每艘这样的飞船都是修会的圣物。这些飞船非常古老，它们的用途是寻找失落的神圣标准建造模板。根据传说记载，为了制造这样的舰船，数个铸造世界被直接拆成了零件。”

languages.text: « Les Arches sont des sanctuaires de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Chacun de ces vaisseaux est une relique. Ils sont incroyablement anciens et ont été conçus pour la recherche de modèles sacrés du Schéma de Construction Standardisé. La légende raconte que des mondes forges entiers ont été démantelés pour fournir les pièces nécessaires à la construction de ces vaisseaux. »
languages.original_text: "Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

traits.locale_text: « Les Arches sont des sanctuaires de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Chacun de ces vaisseaux est une relique. Ils sont incroyablement anciens et ont été conçus pour la recherche de modèles sacrés du Schéma de Construction Standardisé. La légende raconte que des mondes forges entiers ont été démantelés pour fournir les pièces nécessaires à la construction de ces vaisseaux. »

languages.text: «Cada arca es un santuario del Adeptus Mechanicus. Son reliquias muy antiguas que se hicieron para buscar los patrones de la plantilla de construcción estándar. Cuentan las leyendas que, para fabricar estas naves, desmontaron un mundo forja al completo».
languages.original_text: "Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

traits.locale_text: «Cada arca es un santuario del Adeptus Mechanicus. Son reliquias muy antiguas que se hicieron para buscar los patrones de la plantilla de construcción estándar. Cuentan las leyendas que, para fabricar estas naves, desmontaron un mundo forja al completo».

languages.text: 「それぞれのアークは帝国技術局の聖域だ。このような船はすべて遺物だ。それらは非常に古く、神聖な標準テンプレート生産のパターンを探すために作られた。このような船を作るために、工業惑星全体が文字通り解体されたという伝説がある」
languages.original_text: "Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

traits.locale_text: 「それぞれのアークは帝国技術局の聖域だ。このような船はすべて遺物だ。それらは非常に古く、神聖な標準テンプレート生産のパターンを探すために作られた。このような船を作るために、工業惑星全体が文字通り解体されたという伝説がある」

languages.text: "Jede Arche ist für den Adeptus Mechanicus eine Zuflucht. Jedes dieser Schiffe ist ein Relikt. Sie sind uralt und wurden gebaut, um nach den heiligen Standardtechnologiekonstruktmustern zu suchen. Die Legenden berichten von ganzen Fabrikwelten, die wortwörtlich in alle Einzelteile zerlegt wurden, damit diese Schiffe gebaut werden konnten."
languages.original_text: "Each Ark is a sanctuary for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Every such ship is a relic. They are incredibly ancient and were made to search for the sacred Standard Template Construct patterns. Legends tell of entire forge worlds that were literally disassembled for parts to make such vessels."

traits.locale_text: "Jede Arche ist für den Adeptus Mechanicus eine Zuflucht. Jedes dieser Schiffe ist ein Relikt. Die Legenden berichten von ganzen Fabrikwelten, die wortwörtlich in alle Einzelteile zerlegt wurden, damit diese Schiffe gebaut werden konnten."
